dict.string: Consent to join the Developer Health Research Study.
Now you will create a passcode to identify yourself to the app and protect access to information you've entered.
This step concludes the onboarding and consent process of the CardinalKit framework. Next up, you will see main app functionality.
Please try again in five minutes.

Use this text to provide an explanation to your app participants about what activity data you intend to read from the Health app and why. This sample will read step count, distance, heart rate, and flights climbed data.

Use this text to provide an explanation to your app participants about what electronic health records (EHR) you intend to collect from the Health app and why. This sample will read all available records (for which permission is granted).
Sign in using your Apple ID is fast and easy, and Apple will not track any of your activities.
We need to confirm your email address and send you a copy of the consent you just signed.
Are you sure you want to withdraw?
Withdrawing from the study will reset the app to the state it was in prior to you originally joining the study.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue. The app will now close.

CardinalKit is a suite of tools designed to help you build a digital health app experience from the ground up. It integrates with Firebase to provide full-stack solutions. We hope you enjoy the love poured into this sample and make many great things with it!

CardinalKit is a suite of tools designed to help you build a digital health app experience from the ground up. It integrates with Firebase to provide full-stack solutions. We hope you enjoy the love poured into this sample and make many great things with it!
Here you should write a bit about what data you are collecting, and why.
Here you should write a bit about what data you are collecting, and why. Additional content written here will show in final consent review form and generated PDF.
What is your commitment in terms of data protection to your app participants? Who will have access to data?
What is your commitment in terms of data protection to your app participants? Who will have access to data? Additional content written here will show in final consent review form and generated PDF.
Information about your team's use of data.
Information about your team's use of data. Additional content.
Information about the expected time commitment per app participant.
Information about the expected time commitment per app participant. Additional content.
Information about any survey(s) in the app.
Information about any survey(s) in the app. Additional content.
Information about any task(s) in the app.
Information about any task(s) in the app. Additional content.
What should your study participants know about the withdrawing process of your study?
What should your study participants know about the withdrawing process of your study? Additional content.

It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.
